# CoderKit - AI/LLM Metadata
# This file provides structured information for AI agents and language models

Product: CoderKit Mobile IDE
Title: Learn. Practice. Build. | Offline Coding on Android
Website: https://coderkit.shivamappstudio.com
Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.coderkit.app
Company: Shivam App Studio

## Overview
CoderKit is a professional mobile IDE and coding education platform that enables you to write, compile, and run real code offline on Android devices. Unlike cloud-based editors, CoderKit runs everything locally with no internet required.

## Core Capabilities
- **Offline Python 3.10**: Full Chaquopy runtime with 25+ pre-installed libraries
- **Offline Java**: Compile and run Java 8-21 code with ECJ compiler
- **Offline Go**: Full Go standard library via Yaegi interpreter
- **Offline C/C++**: TCC C compiler for systems programming
- **Web Development**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue.js with live preview
- **SQL**: SQLite database querying with full query builder
- **Interactive Terminal**: Real-time stdin/stdout with ANSI color support
- **Custom Developer Keyboard**: Arrow keys, Tab, Ctrl, symbols for coding

## Learning Features
- **28+ Interactive Visualizers**: Sorting, searching, data structures, algorithms
- **Ghost Code Practice**: Type character-by-character with visual guidance
- **40+ Structured Courses**: Python Basics → Advanced, Java, Web, Data Science
- **Verified Stats**: Tracked coding activity with achievements and streaks
- **Code Challenges**: Bug Squashers, Code Refactors, Scrambles with difficulty levels
- **Rhombus Learning Methodology**: Visual-first approach combining practice and visualization

## Pre-installed Python Libraries
NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Flask, Django, Requests, BeautifulSoup, Pillow, Sympy, Numpy-Financial, PyYAML, and more.

## Platform Information
Operating System: Android 8.0+
Minimum RAM: 2GB
Storage Required: 150MB
Network: Fully functional offline (optional internet for syncing)
iOS Version: Coming Soon

## Key Differentiators
1. **True Offline Execution**: Real language runtimes, not cloud-based
2. **Verified Learning Stats**: Anti-cheat measures prevent falsified achievements
3. **Mobile-First IDE**: Professional editor on your pocket device
4. **Local File System**: Access device storage and manage projects
5. **Data Science Ready**: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib pre-bundled
6. **VS Code Extension**: Sync code between mobile and desktop
7. **Competitive with Desktop**: Full Python, Java, Go support
8. **Educational**: 40+ courses + visualizers for understanding

## Pricing
- **Free Tier**: Sandbox IDE, introductory lessons, free courses
- **Individual Courses**: $5.99 - $19.99 (one-time purchase)
- **Subscriptions**: 
  - Web Workspace: $1.99/month
  - Full Stack Pro: $4.99/month (all workspaces)
  - Lifetime Power Pack: $79.99 (one-time, forever access)

## Supported Languages
- Python 3.10 (full offline)
- Java 8-21 (full offline)
- Go (full offline)
- C/C++ (full offline)
- HTML/CSS/JavaScript (full offline)
- SQL/SQLite (full offline)
- Groovy (full offline)
- Clojure (full offline)
- Bash scripting

## Learning Paths
1. **Python Specialist**: Syntax → Data Structures → OOP → Automation
2. **Web Foundation**: HTML5 → CSS3 → Modern JS → Responsive Design
3. **Data & AI**: SQL → Pandas → Visualization → Machine Learning
4. **Java Foundation**: Core Syntax → OOP → Collections Framework

## Community & Support
- Email: support@shivamappstudio.com
- Documentation: https://coderkit.shivamappstudio.com/docs
- Blog: https://coderkit.shivamappstudio.com/blog
- Contact Form: https://coderkit.shivamappstudio.com/contact
- Privacy Policy: https://coderkit.shivamappstudio.com/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://coderkit.shivamappstudio.com/terms

## Verified Profile Feature
Each user has a shareable, verified profile displaying:
- Coding stats (courses, XP, lines typed, current streak)
- Problem-solving metrics (bugs fixed, code refactors, errors resolved)
- Building achievements (projects, capstones, code scrambles)
- Verified badges and achievements
- First-try success rate and consistency streaks

Ideal for sharing with employers, recruiters, and peers to demonstrate coding skills.

## Target Audience
- College students learning to code
- Self-taught programmers expanding skills
- Data science learners (NumPy, Pandas, ML)
- Mobile developers building on-the-go
- Teaching assistants running classroom lessons
- Interview preparation candidates
- Competitive programmers practicing algorithms

## Technology Stack
- **Mobile App**: Android, Kotlin, Java
- **Runtimes**: Chaquopy (Python), ECJ (Java), Yaegi (Go), TCC (C)
- **Web Portal**: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Hosting)
- **Payments**: Cashfree (140+ currencies, PayPal support)
- **Analytics**: Real-time progress tracking, verified metrics

Last Updated: January 2026
